name: Ruthie Foster
description: '''Ruthie Cecelia Foster''' (born February 10, 1964) is an American singer-songwriter of [[blues]] and [[Folk music|folk]] music. She mixes a wide palette of American song forms, from gospel and blues to jazz, folk and soul. She has often been compared to [[Bonnie Raitt]] and [[Aretha Franklin]]. Foster has been nominated for multiple Grammy Awards for Best Blues Album and Best Contemporary Blues Album, and won her first Grammy on February 2, 2025.
